Title: Requires firearms, rifles and shotguns to be manufactured or modified to be permanently incompatible with a rapid-fire modification device
Summary: Requires firearms, rifles and shotguns to be manufactured or modified to be permanently incompatible with a rapid-fire modification device; requires manufacturers of such weapons to make such modifications to existing weapons at no cost to owners and dealers; gives owners one year to obtain compliance.
LawCode: Amd §§265.10, 265.01-c & 265.00, Pen L; add §369-fff, Gen Bus L; add §236, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, the general business law and the executive law, in relation to requiring firearms, rifles and shotguns to be manufactured or modified to be permanently incompatible with a rapid-fire modification device
